snippet: The top housing finance regulator said the new company was meant as a step toward reducing the government’s role in the mortgage market.
abstract: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac will form new joint company for securitizing home loans as steppingstone toward reducing government involvement in mortgage market.
lead_paragraph: The top housing finance regulator said the new company was meant as a step toward reducing the government’s role in the mortgage market.

headline.seo: Fannie-Freddie in Venture to Securitize Home Loans
headline.main: Fannie-Freddie in Venture to Securitize Home Loans

keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
